Package utils

Class LogFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Formatter
      • utils.LogFormatter
  • public class LogFormatter
extends java.util.logging.Formatter
    A class that describes the formatter used by the logger of the FSM. Relies on the ANSI console plugin under eclipse
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Arthur Depasse
    See Also:
    FSMLogger

    • Field Detail

      • ANSI_RESET

        public static final java.lang.String ANSI_RESET
        A series of ANSI escape codes. The use of them requires an eclipse plugin that manages ANSI, for instance ANSI console
